attributes.action: Reconsider committing the United Kingdom to the absurd EU proposition to compel us to use low voltage fluorescent light bulbs that provide inadequate, cold, depressing light provided by ugly bulbs that don't fit into standard fittings or are unusable in chandeliers and other artful light fittings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time that our politicians who are supposed to be our representatives are reminded that we are not a Soviet Socialist Republic but a free democracy. 

We keep being reminded by our leaders that Choice is all important in a free society. Being forced to abandon the use of traditional light bulbs in favour of the ugly alternatives is hardly 'Choice'! 

The bandwagon of Global Warming scaremongering is clearly going off the rails.

Get real!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
